Access to the minigame and shop requires completion of the Cabin Fever quest. "The stuff" apparently contains some questionable and/or toxic content, as it has been banned by the Cooks' Guild of Varrock. The stuff is purchased from Honest Jimmy's House of Stuff with 50 pieces of eight from the Trouble Brewing minigame on Mos Le'Harmless. Access to the minigame and shop requires completion of the Cabin Fever quest. "The stuff" apparently contains some questionable and/or toxic content, as it has been banned by the Cooks' Guild of Varrock. However, it does not actually cause any negative side effects when used in brewing.

The stuff is used in brewing when making ales after placing two buckets of water and two barley malt into the fermenting vat. After adding it, the specific ale ingredient and ale yeast are also put in. The odds of brewing a mature ale increases. The chances of ale maturing naturally is 5%, but adding the stuff increases this chance to 36%.[1]

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • "The stuff" is most likely a reference to the 1985 movie of the same title.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. â†‘ Testing has shown it is not 64% as Mod Ash was previously cited and likely closer to 36%. Please comment on Talk:Brewing with questions, comments, or if you want to contribute data.

[[File:The stuff detail.png|left|140px]]
'''The stuff''' is purchased from [[Honest Jimmy's House of Stuff]] with 50 [[pieces of eight]] from the [[Trouble Brewing]] [[minigame]] on [[Mos Le'Harmless]]. Access to the minigame and shop requires completion of the [[Cabin Fever]] [[quest]]. "The stuff" apparently contains some questionable and/or toxic content, as it has been banned by the [[Cooks' Guild]] of [[Varrock]]. However, it does not actually cause any negative side effects when used in [[brewing]].

The stuff is used in brewing when making [[ale]]s after placing two [[buckets of water]] and two [[barley malt]] into the [[fermenting vat]]. After adding it, the specific ale ingredient and [[ale yeast]] are also put in. The odds of brewing a [[mature ale]] increases. The chances of ale maturing naturally is 5%, but adding the stuff increases this chance to 36%.{{Refn|Testing has shown it is not 64% as Mod Ash was previously cited and likely closer to 36%. Please comment on [[Talk:Brewing]] with questions, comments, or if you want to contribute data.}}

==Trivia==
* "The stuff" is most likely a reference to the 1985 {{WP|The Stuff|movie}} of the same title.
